crimm.Utils.StructureUtils¶

Functions

chain_to_polymerchain(chain[, reset_resid])

Convert a chain to a PolymerChain object.

combine_hetero_chains(chains, new_chain_id)

Combine a list of chains into a single chain with a specified chain ID.

get_charges(chain)

Get the total charge of a generated chain.

get_coords(entity[, include_alt])

Get atom coordinates from any structure entity level or a list of entities.

index_to_letters(index[, letter])

Enumerate a sequence of letters based on the alphabet from a integer number. The length of the sequence corresponds to the exponent of 26 from the given index, and the last letter is determined by (index % 26). e.g. index_to_letters(0) = 'A' index_to_letters(25) = 'Z' index_to_letters(26) = 'AA' index_to_letters(701) = 'ZZ' index_to_letters(702) = 'AAA'.

letters_to_index(letters)

For a given string enumerated from alphabet, return the associated index. This is the inverse function of index_to_letters e.g. letters_to_index('A') = 0 letters_to_index('Z') = 25 letters_to_index('AA') = 26 letters_to_index('ZZ') = 701 letters_to_index('AAA') = 702.

rename_chains_by_order(entity)

Rename the chain IDs based on the order listed in the parent model so that the IDs start from 'A' and are continuous in the alphabetical order.
